text: Pipariya, Narayani is a village development committee in Rautahat District in the Narayani Zone of south-eastern Nepal. At the time of the 1991 Nepal census it had a population of 3786.It is also known as Haiharpur.A great leader of Nepal Harihar prasad yadav was born here. ==References== Category:Populated places in Rautahat District
title: Pipariya, Rautahat
